segments.text: I want to try something different today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want a different hair style .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you make my hair short ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Exactly how short do you want it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Make it a few inches long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you sure you want me to cut it that short ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been thinking about this for a while now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I'll do it if you're positive that this is what you want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I honestly want my hair that short .
segments.speaker: S1
